sourcesContent:
import { View, Text,Image,StyleSheet } from 'react-native'
import React from 'react'
import { TouchableOpacity } from 'react-native'

export default function CardComponent({category}) {
  return (
    <TouchableOpacity style={styles.outercard}>
    
        <Text style={styles.imagetext} >
            {category.categoryname}
        </Text>
        <Image source={category.categoryimage} style={styles.imagestyling}/>
    
    </TouchableOpacity>
  )
}
const styles=StyleSheet.create({
    outercard:{
        width:300,
        height:250,
        backgroundColor:'white',
        borderRadius:10,
        margin:10,
        shadowColor: "#000",
        elevation:5,
        shadowColor:'black',
       
        shadowOpacity:0.26,
        shadowRadius:6,
        alignItems:'center',
        justifyContent:'center',
        textAlign:'center'
    },
    imagestyling:{
        width:'100%',
        height:'100%',
        resizeMode:'cover',
        borderRadius:10
    },
    imagetext:{
        position:'absolute',
        bottom:10,
        color:'orange',
        fontSize:25,
        fontWeight:'bold',
        zIndex:1000
    }
})
